text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- > 0 ) { int n , max = - 1 , m = 0 , n1 = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] , i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i + 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { a [ i ] [ j ] = - 1 ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > max ) { m = i ; n1 = j ; max = a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } } int s = max , n2 ; if ( n1 == 0 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) s += a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; } else { n2 = n1 ; for ( i = m - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { if ( a [ i ] [ n1 ] > a [ i ] [ n1 - 1 ] ) s += a [ i ] [ n1 ] ; else { s += a [ i ] [ n1 - 1 ] ; n1 -- ; } } n1 = n2 ; } for ( i = m + 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ n1 + 1 ] > a [ i ] [ n1 ] ) { s += a [ i ] [ n1 + 1 ] ; n1 ++ ; } else s += a [ i ] [ n1 ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
